title: Performance Marketing
excerpt: We are creating digital sales processes to attract more customers to service providers that use paid advertising. We specialize in creating a funnel for our customers. Our funnel must generate requests, so customers no longer have to rely on them. Instead, customers can expand their business.

images.alt: Three men sitting while using laptops and watching man beside whiteboard.

title: 7 Productivity Tips to Avoid Burnout
excerpt: Admit it, everyone at work has a turning point. No matter how much you love your work or enjoying working with your colleagues, there are times when fatigue and stress dominate, then there is a sense of defeat. It's not someone else's fault, you have the right to feel unmotivated and exhausted from time to time.

images.alt: Man in gray shirt facing sticky notes.

title: Hack Your Productivity
excerpt: You already have the most powerful efficiency tool available: your brain. Whether it's your first job or you're watching retirement, there are tested methods you can use to amplify this large mass of neurons in your head. I talked to a couple of scientists about several methods that can rip you out of multitasking and lead you on the road to success.

Eyeglasses with black frame on a laptop.
